participant_1.background:
I got a puppy for my birthday.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days.
I want a place to cook and to entertain my friends and family.
I went to the cinema with friends to watch the latest action movie.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy drinking coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony, and then I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal.
i look down on people who did not.
I am a strong person who has big dreams and I am not going to let my anxiety get in the way.
I climbed a local mountain with my friends for my birthday.
I treasure my ability to swim.

content.text: Happy Birthday! I got a puppy for my birthday.
I climbed a local mountain for my birthday. We sound like opposites!
I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days.
I enjoy drinking coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony.
I went to the cinema with my friends to watch the latest action movie.
I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal.
I want to be a successful writer and a motivational speaker.
That is awesome! I hope you achieve your dreams.
Thanks! I hope you achieve yours too.
Thanks! I hope to one day have a house with a big kitchen so I can cook and entertain my friends and family.
That sounds like a wonderful goal
